H0.text: A ruler is the equipment the student should use to measure the thermal expansion of a strip of metal as it is heated from 0ºC to 50ºC.

H1.text: A balance is the piece of equipment the student should use to measure the thermal expansion of a strip of metal as it is heated from 0ºC to 50ºC.

H2.text: A compass is the piece of equipment the student should use to measure the thermal expansion of a strip of metal as it is heated from 0°C to 50°C.

H3.text: A protractor should be used by the student to measure the thermal expansion of a strip of metal as it is heated from 0ºC to 50ºC.

A4.text: The position of the rod is determined by a micrometer screw gauge or spherometer.
